Solution:
- Fetch all registrations with TenantId into memory first
- Apply email filtering in-memory using ToLowerInvariant()
- Same pattern used in MasterUser email check (line 232-237)

Technical Details:
- EF Core cannot translate Value.ToLower() on Value Objects to SQL
- Client-side evaluation after ToListAsync() resolves translation issue
- Performance: Acceptable for registration table (low row count)
